toolbox.auditmon.doi

Class DOIModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • toolbox.auditmon.doi.DOIModel

  • public class DOIModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a proof of concept implementation of the Mylar: a degree-of-interest model for IDEs using an AuditMon session, with an added concept of model granularity
    Author:
    Ben Holland
